Package ohos.sensor.common

Class SensorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sensor.common.SensorUtils

  • public class SensorUtils
extends Object
    Provides methods for parsing the category, type, and index of a sensor based on the sensor ID.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Sensors#SENSOR

      • parseSensorCategory

        public static int parseSensorCategory​(int sensorId)
        Parses the category of a sensor based on the sensor ID.
        Parameters:
        sensorId - Indicates the ID of the sensor.
        Returns:
        Returns the category of the sensor.

      • parseSensorIndex

        public static int parseSensorIndex​(int sensorId)
        Parses the index of a sensor based on the sensor ID.

        If multiple sensors of a specific type are available, this method is used to parse the index of the current sensor.

        Parameters:
        sensorId - Indicates the ID of the sensor.
        Returns:
        Returns the index of the sensor.
        Since:
        1
